messages.subject: Another penpal request
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I have a 6.5 year old son who had an email penpal in Australia. They sent playground pictures back and forth, discussed the weather...all in a
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone,

I have a 6.5 year old son who had an email penpal in Australia. They sent playground pictures back and forth, discussed the weather...all in a couple of sentences at a time. Of course, I thought it was great....my son asked everyday if "toby" had written back yet..then, nothing. So, if anyone has a son who is looking for an email penpal , please email us privately at janqlan@.... Leyton was born in July and likes to describe himself as :" I have 2 chihuahuas ,I like to play outside and I like to play with silly string and I like to swing and thats it.":)

Thanks,
Lisa

_____________________________________________________________
Netscape. Just the Net You Need.
